attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr. Brown:

I think the G-7 nations should threat the OPEC nations to withdraw visas for all personel in those governments if they cut oil production to keep prices high.  They are not talking about keeping fair prices, but high prices to steal from the people and deepen the crisis. And that should be  only the first move. What do you think?  You must stop these OPEC thugs.

Kindest regards,

Jose F Rondon
Quito, Ecuador

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
